name: CreatingDigitalAssetswithChristina
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Listen to Creating Digital Assets, with Christina Haftman. Kajabi expert and host of this Alexa flash briefing. Bringing you short, audio broadcasts everyday with valuable content on how to increase your productivity, grow a profitable online business and passive income. Tips and actionable steps on the topics of product creation, copywriting, customer acquisition, branding, digital marketing strategy and funnel optimization, using Kajabi and other software that easily integrates with it. Thank you for listening!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
